images.caption: Figure 1:Number of different authors in each edition, highlighting those submitting an article to the conference for the first time.
Figure 2:Number of different authors in each edition, highlighting those with non-academic affiliations and with a non-Italian affiliation.

Figure 3:Countries of non-Italian author affiliations submitting a paper at the CLiC-it conference. Darker colour shades reflect the number of papers submitted that include at least one author from that country.
Figure 4:Number of different affiliations in each edition, also showcasing the number of affiliations outside of Italy.
Figure 5:Giant Component in the network of collaborations between affiliations at CLiC-it.
Figure 6:Number of CLiC-it papers organised by topic.
Figure 7:Coverage of topics in CLiC-it papers across editions.
Figure 8:Number of affiliations from each country (besides Italy) per edition.
